description: Get a 10% discount on all orders above certain value depending on the currency and net/gross price. This discount is not exclusive and can be combined with other discounts.
decision_rule_query_string: (price-mode = "GROSS_MODE" AND ((sub-total >= "100" AND currency = "EUR") OR (sub-total >= "115" AND currency = "CHF"))) OR (price-mode = "NET_MODE" AND ((sub-total >= "80" AND currency = "EUR") OR (sub-total >= "95" AND currency = "CHF")))
